text: Yajurvedi is an Indian surname used by Yajurvedi Brahmins, meaning versed in Yajurveda. It is one of the two major sub-sects among Deshastha Brahmins. Similarly there are Rigvedi (one who knows Rigveda). ==See also== *Rigvedi *Dwivedi *Trivedi *Upreti *Chaturvedi ==References== Category:Indian names
title: Yajurvedi
